fields.name: file
fields.label: 3D model file
fields.description: Upload a glTF (.glb / .gltf) file here. The preferred format is "glTF 2.0 binary" in a single file.

fields.name: alt
fields.label: Alternative text
fields.description: Alternative text for screen readers.

fields.name: backgroundImage
fields.label: Background image
fields.description: Optional image that will be used for the background.

fields.name: poster
fields.label: Poster image
fields.description: Optional image that will be shown before the 3D model is loaded. This can be used to show a preview of the 3D model that is large and may need some time to load. Note that it makes only sense to add a poster image if the file is not too large in size itself.

fields.name: maxWidth
fields.label: Maximum width
fields.description: H5P will usually scale content to full width. Set a maximum width here in CSS units (px, rem, etc.). Please note that this will not influence the maximum width of the H5P content as a whole.

fields.name: minHeight
fields.label: Minimum height
fields.description: H5P will usually determine the height based on the width. Change the minimum height here in CSS units (px, rem, etc.) in case the model is displayes too small for your liking.

fields.name: maxHeight
fields.label: Maximum height
fields.description: H5P will usually determine the height based on the width. Set a maximum height here in CSS units (px, rem, etc.). Please note that this will not influence the maximum height of the H5P content as a whole.

fields.name: noModel
fields.label: No model found
fields.default: Could not load a 3D model. Did someone forget to upload one?

fields.name: noHotspotsWithContents
fields.label: No hotspots with contents
fields.default: No hotspots with contents found. Did someone forget to add some or to attach the hotspots to the model?

fields.name: clickOnHotspotToSeeDetails
fields.label: Click on a hotspot to see details
fields.default: Click on a hotspot to see details.
